general.payment_confirmation_description_text: You can now access locked content with this purchase
general.facebook_permissions_alert_text: Please provide Facebook permission to share email information in order to login with Facebook.
general.password_reset_description_text: Enter your email to reset your password:
general.logout_description_text: Are you sure you want to log out?
general.nonexistent_user_alert_text: No user exists for this email
general.password_reset_confirmation_description_: Check your email in order reset your password for this account
general.restore_purchase_confirmation_descriptio: Any pre-existing purchases you’ve made have been restored and assigned to your account.
general.default_alert_text: An error occurred trying to process your request. Please go back and try again.
general.existing_user_alert_text: This user already exists. Try logging in.
general.legal_details_text: Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
general.expired_purchase_alert_text: The applicable purchase you’ve made has expired. Please make a valid purchase to access this content.
general.non_matching_restored_purchases_alert_te: You’ve successfully restored any valid previously made purchases, however, none of them provide access to the requested content
general.restore_prompt_text: If you already purchased an account -
general.no_purchases_to_restore_alert_text: The store did not return any valid purchases that can be restored
general.invalid_email_alert_text: Please enter a valid email address
general.logout_error_alert_text: The logout process encountered an error. Please try again.
